item.title: 22 Nov 2025 10:30
item.description:
After a failed attempt last week, I made it up to Mbankolo this morning. Romero joined me and we ran into an LGF at the base of the hill. This place is pretty neat and way better than Mt. Febe! So glad I decided to give this another shot.

On the way back, instead of coming via the market, we decided to climb up towards Mt. Febe and took the inner roads via the golf course. This could be a fun route to retrace on the reverse sometime later.

I need to figure out why my garmin isn’t recording the GPX properly. Oddly, Looks like all other metrics are logged correctly. The only thing I really changed was syncing it with GadgetBridge last week.

Stopped by the Campost office earlier this Monday and bought a good ton of stamps. Added them to my digital stamp collection. item.title: 14 Nov 2025 10:30
item.description:
Why does it feel like I’ve been writing the same story multiple times over the last three days? Because, maybe I actually did?

Wrote something to that effect earlier today to one of the teams I’ve been trying to resolve an ongoing issue with. They are a good bunch of folks. But there seems to be a disconnect somewhere that’s causing needless delays in what I’d like to get done. I feel issues fail to get resolved mostly because of lack of proper communication during their shift handovers.

A few minutes after I sent that note, somewhere it also hit me real hard. I shouldn’t really have sent that note? It does not benefit anybody but just my restless self. Adds nothing positive to the situation and if anything effectively brings the relationship a few steps backwards. Super frustrating when you see both sides of the coin and still need to get shit done…ðŸ”—

item.title: 29 Oct 2025 10:30
item.description:
Reorganized my Trilium Notes a bit. Over time I started dumping notes in there and somewhere it all went a bit wayward. I really need to start using it as a proper knowledge base. The good thing is most content that I refer to frequently is all in there. This along with my Signal ‘Note-to-self’ are my go-to spaces.

I’d like to read more blogs that are not tech related. Mostly driven by my curiosity in the tech space, I’ve somehow gotten into this bubble of tech-adjacent blogs. Would be nice to pop out a bit. Maybe I should explore powRSS a bit? I’ve also noticed I lean towards people who have their own personal domain. Maybe it’s a sign of some sort of commitment towards actually owning their writing?

Thinking if I want to get a nice digital sketch book. Or I should just re-purpose that old kindle? There are times I just don’t want to ‘write’. Some things are probably better just sketched out. I’ve tinkered with the Sketches app before. Maybe i’ll just port that over to the kindle one of these days…

Google seems to be making all moves to prevent sideloading apps in Android. I think it’s time I shift gears and look at other alternatives out there.

Zen browser looks real neat. Should give it a spin one of these days.

Nothing like a mildly thawed frozen Papaya…ðŸ”—
